attributes.action: Make street cleaners and teachers clean ice from the paths when they are unable to get to work!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of walking around with carts trying to pick up rubbish they cant see due to snow and ice, the street cleaners should be speading grit on the paths from their carts, Also all the teachers who can get to work due to their school being shut should be made to go and help clear the paths too!!
